Articles.Content:
Okay, I'm waiting for a particular mod WHICH SHALL NOT BE NAMED...  apologies to Bob Dylan

Please add your own verses.

Theme for verse one:  Mods

How many days must a man log in
For a mod that has yet to be updated?

And how many saves must a man start afresh
As mods are staggered out to the masses?

And how many mods will it take till he knows
That his new computer bought has just fried?

The answer is my friend is blowin' in the wind;
Yet the flag seems to blow without any wind.

Peace.
